a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Number of people without access to improved sanitation facilities, 1990 to
Improved sanitation facilities include flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine), ventilated improved pit
(VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet.
Source: Our World in Data based on World Bank, World Development Indicators
